TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It belongs to the families of drugs called antitumor antibiotics and topoisomerase inhibitors. Also called rebeccamycin analog.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento de cáncer. Es un tipo de antibiótico antitumoral y de inhibidor de la topoisomerasa. También se llama análogo de la rebecamicina.
